mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.unit_id AS "unit.id", a.building_no AS "buildingNo", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.point AS "point", a.address, a.ieme, a.status, a.alarm_Date AS "alarmDate", a.floor_num AS "floorNum", a.plane_img AS "planeImg", a.elevators_num AS "elevatorsNum", a.stair_num AS "stairNum", a.video_url AS "videoUrl", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u.name as "unit.name", a.remarks AS "remarks"
left join sys_unit u on u.id=a.unit_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_building( id, name, unit_id, building_no, latitude, longitude, point, ieme , address, floor_num, plane_img, elevators_num, stair_num, video_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{unit.id}, #{buildingNo}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{point}, #{ieme}, #{address}, #{floorNum}, #{planeImg}, #{elevatorsNum}, #{stairNum}, #{videoUrl}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_building SET name = #{name}, unit_id = #{unit.id}, building_no = #{buildingNo}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, point = #{point}, ieme = #{ieme}, address=#{address}, floor_num = #{floorNum}, plane_img = #{planeImg}, elevators_num = #{elevatorsNum}, stair_num = #{stairNum}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
